thread.title: Mila Kunis loves daughter so much that `she'll bury body for her`
thread.title_full: Mila Kunis loves daughter so much that `she'll bury body for her` - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mila Kunis loves daughter so much that `she'll bury body for her`
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct.23 (ANI): Mila Kunis's love for her daughter Wyatt knows no bounds as she recently joked that she would herself take the charge of burying the body killed by her little daughter.*
Washington D.C., Oct.23 (ANI): Mila Kunis's love for her daughter Wyatt knows no bounds as she recently joked that she would herself take the charge of burying the body killed by her little daughter. In a recent interview, the 32-year-old actress, joked "I think if she killed someone, I'd literally be like, 'I got it", E! Online reports. The 'Ted' actress added, "Where do you want me to help bury the body?' Like, I wouldn't even question it and I can't say that about anybody else in my life." Kunis , who is married to Ashton Kutcher, also revealed that her one year daughter accompanies her to work every day. (ANI) Â»
